name: coalification
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the process by which dead plants slowly become coal: The next stage is coalification, the very slow process in which peat is converted to coal. Different coals have undergone coalification to different extents.
More examplesFewer examplesThe origin of the heat source for coalification still remains uncertain.The presence of coaly particles in the sandstones indicates a rapid and short-lived coalification event soon after deposition.Coalification and gas generation are still going on.There is no evidence of coalification in these light-coloured fossils.
